colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES BDE MCHOG DRIL BU LHA LNGA'I SMON LAM SHIS BRJOD 'DI NI 'PHAGS PA'I NOR BDUN GYIS PHYUG CING GSUNG RAB DU MA LA MKHYEN SPYAN MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I DPON CHUNG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'PHEL GYIS NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR CHOS SMRA BA LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJES GA-YAR KHRAL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS PHUN TSOGS SO,, ,,)
